TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MarginProperty extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Identifies the margin properties of a visual style element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.MarginProperty> enumeration represents a set of margin properties that describe the placement of visual style elements. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.MarginProperty> values are used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetMargins%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to specify which property value to retrieve for the element that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> currently represents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.MarginProperty CaptionMargins = int32(3603)

Docs.summary: Specifies where caption text can be placed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.MarginProperty ContentMargins = int32(3602)

Docs.summary: Specifies where content can be placed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.MarginProperty SizingMargins = int32(3601)

Docs.summary: Specifies a margin used for nine-grid sizing.
